title: Do you know why you are Iron?
body:
Because you are picking Ryze mid or top and have a 35% win rate with him.

Because you are picking Sej Jungle....

Because you are picking TF Jungle....

Because you are picking Trundle Top...

Because you are picking a champ that in the current META is under 48% win rate AND you suck at them.

Pick something in meta and play a bunch of NORMAL to learn them.

replies.body: No most people that are in iron right now got placed they because that's what the rank system does to fresh accounts now.

Most people actually seem to be iron because they are mechanically good at their champ, but complete and utter trash at map awareness, teamwork, vision, choosing objectives, recalling instead of farming down lane with 120 hp, ect.
^ These are right out of some of my matches in Silver
